I have been here 3 or 4 times and each time has been equally as impressive as the last.  Honestly this is one of my favorite restaurants in the world.  Perfectly casual, yet intimate, the friendly (and english speaking) staff & kitchen turns out some seriously good food at a really reasonable price. As other people have pointed out, the pork ribs, aubergine, truffled egg & foie gras, and beef cheeks are all perpetually solid choices but truthfully, I've never had a bad dish here. This place is tiny so make a reservation, especially if there are more than 2 in your group since there are only 2 tables in the whole restaurant that can accommodate more than 2.   I have always had luck as a walk in for a party of 2 but I usually stop in after 9:30 in the "off season."¡buen provecho!
